title: Itel Vision1 (Gradation Blue, 32 GB)  (3 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Power Adapter, Data Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 19.5:9 Aspect Ratio with 500 Nits Brightness, Full laminated 2.5D incell
product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: B3, B8, WCDMA: B1, B5, B8, 4G LTE: B1, B3, B5, B8, B40, B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 8MP AF Main Camera, VGA (0.3MP) Assistant Camera, AI Dual Rear Camera, Portrait Mode, Smart Recognition, AI Beauty Mode, HDR Mode, Pro Mode, Pano Mode, Low Light Mode, Short Video
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 5MP Front Camera, 1.4μm Pixels, f/2.0 Aperture, AI Beauty Mode, AR Stickers and Filters
product_specification.Other Features: Battery with AI Power Master, Dual Security (Fingerprint + Face Unlock), Face Unlock with Liveness Mode, Smart Recognition, Indian Regional Language Support, Scenario Detection, Short Video Mode, Ultra Power Saving Mode, Multi Function Fingerprint Sensor
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset with 100 Days Replacement

product_description.Fuller Entertainment with 15.46-cm (6.08: The Vision 1 features a 2.5D curved display, a HD+ resolution of 1560x720, and 500 nits of brightness, providing clear visibility even in sunlight. With its 19.5:9 wide aspect ratio and ultra slim bezels, you get to enjoy a truly immersive visual experience. Wider viewing angles, with the IPS technology, make viewing pictures and watching videos much more enjoyable. Also, thanks to its curved rounded corners, you can hold his phone in your hand with ease.
product_description.Powerful Multitasking with 3 GB of RAM: Powered by 3 GB of RAM and a 1.6 GHz octa-core processor, this smartphone provides a smooth and efficient user experience. While its stock android experience ensures that the phone is free from bloatware, software delights like Float ball make for easy shortcuts and functions. Its single “Minus one screen” is designed such that you can access multiple apps without having to install them, providing a much faster and seamless experience.
product_description.Dual Security with Fingerprint Sensor +: Say goodbye to complex passwords as you can now unlock your phone by just glancing at the screen. Thanks to its screen light filling while unlocking, your phone now unlocks in just about 0.2 seconds. Apart from providing extra security, the fingerprint sensor also lets you make online payments, answer calls, record videos, reject alarms, click photos and more with ease. What’s more, you can also sync your frequently used or favourite apps with different fingers.
product_description.4000-mAh High Capacity Battery with AI P: With a depth of just 8.5 mm, the Vision 1 sports a massive 4000 mAh battery which lasts for more than a day in normal usage, allowing you to watch TV shows or videos on the Internet continuously for about 12 hours and play games nonstop for about 7 hours. Also, the AI Power Master in this phone keeps track of your app usage and restricts the consumption of power accordingly.
product_description.Beautiful Captures with AI Dual Camera: The Vision 1’s stylish design is complemented with its premium 8 MP dual rear camera that comes with bright LED Flash and various AI functionalities. With features such as AI Beauty, Low light mode and HDR recording, you can click stunning, high-resolution pictures of your friends, family, pets, and nature. It supports short video formats and also lets you add flavour to your pictures with AR Stickers, and with AI Portrait Mode, you can add depth and bokeh effects to your photos. Also, your selfies will now be much clearer, thanks to its 5 MP Selfie Camera that has 1.4 um Big Pixel.
product_description.3-in-1 Slot with Dual 4G VoLTE Support a: Its 2+1 card slot design enables you to use two SIM cards and one microSD card simultaneously. Apart from featuring an internal storage capacity of 32 GB, it is also expandable up to 128 GB via T-card. It comes with OTG support, and even lets you enjoy Dual VoLTE with both the SIM cards supporting 4G simultaneously. Also, with the VoWiFi feature, you can now make calls seamlessly over Wi-Fi.

review: Super mobile at this rate super but camera is not clear but super mobile
This product very quality and super camera quality very nice product and the battery quality also very nice this idle vession one very good product thank you Flipkart money also very good
Super mobile very fast and smooth nice style i am happy so thank you flipkart and delivered boy is perfect delivery time to delivery
2021 is the best mobile phone, I recommend it to you as it is a good phone for normal use

1st of all , let me share the cons :☹️
1)its IPS display is average.
2) charging time {from 0 to 100) 4:30 hours.😔
3) downloading speed is very slow.😒
4)back camera performance is not up to the mark.
it captures average quality photo compared to
realme c2.😕
5)the processor's frequency is little slow .
(4×1.6 GHz +4×1.2 GHz) compared to realme c2.
6)The processor's architecture is 28 nano meter (nm)
thus, there is heating issue(i feel) and battery
consumption issue compared to realme c2 which
has 12 nm architecture .😫
{less nm = more performance}
7)the company doesn't provide a back cover .
8)speaker quality is average.
9)the itel OS is seems to be similar to cheetah OS
which is in infinix mobiles.
10)we don't know about the glass quality .
(whether it is gorilla glass or not)
11)the touch screen is not so responsive (as i feel)
(cheetah OS is not very secure as I heard OK )
12){optional} I don't think itel will provide any future
updates ( such as android 10 and security patch )
because the company did not claimed about it.
therefore it is a great drawback.🤐

NOW,
lets proceed to the pros : 😋
1)the front camera clicks decent photos.
2)the design is really awesome.😍
3)the process spreadtrum sc9863a has arm cortex
A55 comparatively better than arm cortex A53
(in realme c2)its 20% faster more faster than A53.
4) I did not get any ad on it.(there is no ad may be)
5)ram management is good and good for multi
tasking as it has 3gb ram.
6)It supports split screen ,i did listen music in youtube
and internet surfing simultaneously. its really good
i did not feel any lack on it.😊
7)It has default video calling option which is fantastic.
8)though the frequency is less , the app opening time
is pretty good. I did not feel any lagging.
9)the rear camera has professional photography
mode option . which is fantastic😌
10)battery backup is quite decent.
11)the mobile is quite handy . that feels good.
12)the screen brightness in outdoor is good enough.
as i was playing free fire in Sunshine , i didn't feel
much problem of visibility.
13)and finally don't forget one thing, it has FINGER
PRINT SENSOR which is very fast and which is
missing in realme c2( thats a huge draw back
of realme c2).

PERSONALLY I AM A REALME 6 USER ! AND THIS MOBILE HAS QUITE IMPRESSED ME . ITS NOT TOO BAD I FEELS BASED ON MY EXPERIENCE OF USAGE.
i thought of buying realme c2 . but the problem is that realme c2 does not have finger print sensor . and i really hate about it . therefore i choose to buy this mobile . i checked the battery charging test of realme c2 on youtube and i got no difference . it took same time to recharge the battery. and the performance statistics is also comparatively as good as realme c2.
also one thing , i was getting realme c2 of ram 2gb and itel vision 1 with 3 gb ram at same price. therefore why to choose 2 gb ram😂 instead i finally decided to buy this .
you see, i am a realme 6 user and if i have liked this mobile and if this is quite impressive to me , then definitely you will also like this mobile . i guarantee you.
THEREFORE, BUY IT MY FRIEND 😉☺️

Review after 3 weeks of use:-

1)Camera- Camera is not that good selfi camera is average and rear camera is also average but when zoomed it cannot be used if it will have 13 MP camera so it will be very nice but this is OK.

2)Performance- The performance for normal use or online classes is awesome but when come to gaming, not that good.

3)Battery- The battery is awesome 4000mAh is awesome, takes some time to charge but will last long very much.

4)Processore- As we know it has a 1.4ghz octa core processor. Not that good for high gaming like pubg or free fire but small games can run on this device.

Overall the cons are:-

Not good for gaming.
Rear Camera not that good.
Battery takes about 4:30 hours for charging.
It's an amazing phone looks like apple phones and works like apple. It has amazing camera,battery and it has value of money. I prefer buying this.

pros.Build quality: This phone has a sturdy build quality and an awesome design.
pros.4000 mAh Battery: The 4000 mAh battery is powerful and lasts for more than a day on normal use.

cons.Charging: Charging the phone takes a long time. It takes about 4:30 hours to fully charge.
cons.Camera: The rear and front camera are not upto the mark and produce average quality photos.
cons.15.46-cm (6.088) HD+ IPS Waterdrop Displ: The IPS display is very poor and of average quality.
cons.Performance: The 1.6 GHz octa-core processor is slow and could have been much better at this price range.

summary.verdict: The Itel Vision1 is a good budget phone and value for money.
summary.Additional Information: Supports Freefire, 4g support, Non removable battery.
